# Note that this moves us onto the end of the
# last File.Decl
vim ex 'normal G'

# Prev end of File.Decl
vim ex 'normal []'
vim expr '[getcurpos()[1], getcurpos()[2]]'
stdout '\[5,1\]'

# Prev start of File.Decl
vim ex 'normal [['
vim expr '[getcurpos()[1], getcurpos()[2]]'
stdout '\[3,1\]'
